snippet: But Obama may have what he needs.
abstract: But Obama may have what he needs.
lead_paragraph: There's been an interesting back and forth between Ezra Klein and Ryan Avent over whether Obama has a problem in swing states, even if the national economy is doing a bit better. Overall, swing states have higher unemployment than the nation as a whole; but elections generally turn on the rate of change, not the level, and by that criterion things weren't clear.

headline.main: It Don't Mean A Thing If You Ain't Got Them Swings
